rComments: Not the best teacher as I heard from others. ALWAYS CLICKERS, extra credit isn't even  lot of point, basically for students who have an A- and want a regular A. Dumb

Strome is awesome. Class is super interesting and tests are extremely fair. The material is fairly tough but if you pay attention and keep up it was actually a fairly easy A. Go to office hours because she is great at explaining things in depth. Do the extra problems she assigns, i noticed that a lot of them showed up on her tests.
her lectures are worth to go to even when you have webcast! Indescribable. Good teacher! REally try to make an effort for her students to enjoy genetics!

Genetics is a tough class because the concepts are not all that tangible, but Strome broke the material down in very digestible way. She is awesome lecturer and gives out lots of extra credits opportunities during lecture. Tests were fair, but you really have to know the concepts in detail to do well. DO NOT fall behind and you should do just fine

Awesome lecturer. Super clear and detailed. No curve, but still a very reasonable grader. 1 mt , a final, and a few hw problem sets. Don't really need the book. I highly recommend taking genetics with Susan.

Eventhough I failed the course with Strome, I can honestly say that she was one Hell of a professor, she made the concepts very clear and thoroughly lectured on the concepts, put Genetics in a way that was easy to understand, but Genetics in general is a really tough concept, so be prepared to STUDY and do a lot of practice problem, Test was fair

Strome is seriously the BEST Genetics Professor at UCSC. She explains with clarity & never hesitates to answer students' questions. The 1st time I took Genetics, I got a D & was frustrated about how hard it was to understand concepts in the class, but taking Genetics the 2nd time with Strome was AWESOME. I learned so much from her & ended up w/ a B

Strome was one of the best professors I've had at UCSC. She broke the material down in a way that was very clear. You have to pay attention in lecture, even though it's usually offered at 8am, and do the homework!!

Simply put, her tests are ridiculously hard and she doesn't curve. It doesn't matter how well a teacher lectures when her tests are impossible. She also used the n word on several occasions, which I found very offensive.

She is a wonderful professor. She teaches with such great clarity, however Genetics was crazy hard. No curve. If you have to take genetics, take it with her. Her fail rate is high, but she breaks it down much easier. Never used the book.

Genetics is tough guys. Don't come in thinking it will be a walk in the park with Strome. You think you understand the material and Strome will challenge you with a question that will puzzle you. Weekly hw is challenging. you MUST go to lecture and pay very close attention to do well. I went to every office hour, asked questions, got a B-. No curve

Amazing professor.Hard, but one of the very few good professors we have here at UCSC.You really have to read the questions carefully to understand what she is asking in each problem.Lectures are absolutely mandatory if you want to do any problem solving at all.A enthusiastic professor that really knows her stuff.

Professor Strome is an awesome teacher. If you just go to lecture and take notes she'll explain how to do the homework. But if you miss class you're screwed. Only problem is that she assigns the homework and makes it due before any of the sections so you don't get a chance to get help on it. Also, her tests are not curved.

Professor Strome has mediocre teaching abilities.  She testes almost 100% on her lectures making it pointless to buy the $100+ book.  Plus she makes you buy a clicker that costs %30, as if students have an endless supply of cash.  She IS however, ucsc's best genetics teacher.  Not that that makes her a good one.

Susan Strome broke Genetics down really well. This is probably the most straightforward genetics experience you'll have at this school, just make sure to know  what the questions are asking for. Be sure to put in work, her tests are not graded on a curve. (But they honestly don't need to be.)

I love Professor Strome!  She is a wonderful teacher, who doesn't only provide great everyday examples, but also perform skits for better understanding!  She made this class really fun for me.  I have developed a love for genetics!  As long as you go to class, do Problem Sets, Discussion section problems, and assigned bookwork, you are good to go!
